content.question: In the fourth paragraph, the author elaborates on the history of the “talented tenth” primarily to argue that this idea

choices.label: played a crucial role in enabling Du Bois to accomplish significant sociopolitical change
creates unrealistic expectations among young people of color
has greatest relevance in places where young people of color face persistent opportunity gaps
is implicated in a flawed understanding of black success

content.answer: is implicated in a flawed understanding of black success

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
